attributes.action: Change all old type gas filled bulbs for new LED lighting very cheap to produce and will make a very big saving to the electric and enviroment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
LED lighting is very good uses very low power consumption and will last years and this makes less waste,maintenace saves power and is a simple techology and because it saves so much power we can afford to have more white light in public places
millions of people will buy if we can get them cheap,
